movies.title: 21 Jump Street
movies.actors: Jonah Hill, Channing Tatum, Brie Larson, Dave Franco
movies.plot: A pair of underachieving cops are sent back to a local high school to blend in and bring down a synthetic drug ring.

movies.title: Passengers
movies.actors: Anne Hathaway, Patrick Wilson, Andre Braugher, Dianne Wiest
movies.plot: A grief counselor working with a group of plane-crash survivors finds herself at the root of a mystery when her clients begin to disappear.
